item.title: FreeBSD on RaspBerry Pi
item.description: FreeBSD images for arm are now built from the FreeBSD Foundation ! So it’s an easy process to get it on your Pi. Download your image from the ftp repository Insert a 4Gb or more SD card in your PC and copy the FreeBSD image into it, here are the commands for a Mac: sudo diskutil list​ sudo diskutil unmountDisk /dev/disk1​ sudo dd if=/Users/akh/Downloads/FreeBSD-10.0-STABLE-arm- armv6-RPI-B-20140127-r261200.img of=/dev/rdisk1 bs=1m​ sudo diskutil eject /dev/disk1​ Boot your pi with the card and welcome to FreeBSD !
